channel.title: Quora 热门回答
channel.description: 用中文浏览Quora上的热门回答

item.title: Who's excited for the @NASAWebb launch of the James Webb Space telescope on Christmas? Quora Optical Physicist and Engineer Bill Otto has all the details! https://t.co/LOEePcrhwa https://t.co/5NF2nGFlTR
